properties.description: Attractive three bedroom semi-detached family home situated within 0.5 miles of Petts Wood station with fast trains to London and within easy walking distance of local shops, schools, bus routes and National Trust woodland. The property comprises; two receptions, fitted 18'9 x 10'1 kitchen/breakfast room and conservatory. The property also benefits from having a utility room and cloakroom. To the first floor there are three bedrooms and a family bathroom with separate WC. Additional features include double glazing, gas central heating and a well presented interior...
properties.location: Petts Wood Road, Petts Wood, Orpington BR5

properties.description:
Presented in excellent decorative order throughout is this two double bedroom, two bathroom, garden flat.
The modern fitted kitchen is open plan to the living room which boasts solid wooden floors and includes integrated appliances including a dishwasher & a washing machine. This large open plan benefits from bi folding doors onto a secluded private courtyard garden. Both bedrooms are double sized, and the family bathroom boasts a matching three piece suite a shower attachment over the bath. There is also a separate wet room. There are walnut doors throughout and wiring for Sky TV/aerial points in the living room/kitchen and both bedrooms.
This apartment being only five years old, is still under a 10 year building guarantee...

Presented in immaculate condition throughout, this contemporary condo offers modern urban living within a secure, high-spec development. The open-plan living and dining area features floor-to-ceiling windows allowing for an abundance of natural light, while the fully fitted kitchen includes integrated appliances and stone worktops. The principal bedroom benefits from built-in wardrobes and an en-suite shower room, while the additional bedroom is serviced by a sleek, fully tiled bathroom. Residents enjoy access to a private gym, concierge service, and communal rooftop terrace with panoramic city views.

This beautifully maintained single-storey bungalow combines comfort, space, and privacy within a tranquil residential setting. The property features a generous dual-aspect living room with feature fireplace and direct access to a landscaped rear garden. The modern fitted kitchen offers ample storage, integrated appliances, and a breakfast area overlooking the patio. Two spacious double bedrooms are complemented by a contemporary family bathroom and additional guest cloakroom. The home also benefits from a private driveway, detached garage, and low-maintenance front garden.

A substantial detached residence presented in excellent decorative order, offering well-balanced accommodation across two floors. The ground floor comprises a bright and airy reception room with bay windows, a formal dining area, and a modern fitted kitchen with granite worktops and integrated appliances. Upstairs are four double bedrooms, including a principal suite with en-suite shower room and fitted wardrobes. The property is set behind a private driveway with ample off-street parking, a double garage, and a beautifully landscaped rear garden ideal for entertaining.

An exceptional villa finished to the highest standard, showcasing elegant architectural design and expansive living spaces throughout. The grand entrance hall leads to multiple reception rooms with floor-to-ceiling glazing, opening directly onto manicured gardens and a private swimming pool. The bespoke kitchen is fully fitted with premium appliances, marble countertops, and a central island. Upstairs, the principal suite includes a walk-in wardrobe, private terrace, and luxury en-suite bathroom. Additional features include underfloor heating, smart home integration, and secure gated access with private parking.

Presented in superb condition, this bright and spacious flat occupies a desirable position within a modern purpose-built development. The property features an open-plan kitchen and living area with large windows and engineered wood flooring. The contemporary kitchen is fitted with integrated appliances, while the bedroom offers ample wardrobe space and access to a stylish bathroom with full-height tiling. Further benefits include a private balcony, secure entry system, lift access, and residentsâ€™ communal courtyard.
